IU's 22nd Birthday Phototaking

18 Apr 2014

Reading time ~1 minute

On May 2014, Singaenas came together for banner making and a photoshoot. A video of the banner making process and the photos will be sent to IU in Korea for her 22nd Birthday. During the photoshoot, some Koreans recognised IU from our banners and offered to help us take the photo!

Video

Video of the banner making process. An uncensored version of the video was also sent to IU together with the photographs taken. Unfortunately due to copyright, audio “Friday” has been removed from the video.
